title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; pip-installable wrapper around the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package offering Ollama LLM, embed and chat components.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Clean open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rich interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot’s UI.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support and synchronous/asynchronous APIs.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat app that lets you pick any local Ollama model via dropdown.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaChatGenerator nodes.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library for Ollama with async streaming, chat and embeddings; NuGet package available.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Production-ready Docker Compose stack bundling Ollama, Open WebUI, GPU support and nginx.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Lightweight RAG example using Ollama + Sentence-Transformers + FAISS in a single notebook.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats using any Ollama model and supports slash commands.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: Logseq plugin that adds “Ask Ollama” slash command for AI-assisted note taking.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix derivation for Ollama enabling reproducible installs on Linux/macOS with GPU drivers.

title: ollama-rf
summary: Robot Framework library exposing Ollama keywords for AI-driven test automation.
